message:
Improve daily picture generation and timeline display

Backend changes:
- Fix database access bug in generate_daily_picture (use database.get_db())
- Simplify image generation prompt for minimal, single-object images
- Add deduplication logic to avoid repetitive image themes
- Update writing suggestion prompt to be conversational and gentle
  - Max 15 words, forward-looking nudges
  - Focus on "what to write next" not analysis
  - Examples: "What if you...", "Maybe explore..."

Frontend changes:
- Display actual note text in timeline instead of hardcoded placeholders
- Extract text from sessions grouped by createdAt date
- Show first sentence or 60 char preview for days with notes
- Keep placeholder text for empty days

Database migration:
- Add createdAt field to all existing sessions using created_at timestamp
- Enables per-session date tracking for timeline display
